amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 80, 81, 83, 84, 85, 86, 87, 93, 94, 95, 96, and 97 printed in House Report 114-571. See page D541 of the Congressional Record of May 18, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 80, 81, 83, 84, 85, 86, 87, 93, 94, 95, 96, and 97 printed in House Report 114-571.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A035) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
